entry.title: Saturday: Periods of light snow. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 16 this morning and minus 6 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Saturday 11 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 2.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Snow beginning late this evening. Local amount 2 cm. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 overnight. Temperature steady near minus 2. Wind chill near minus 8. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Saturday 11 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High plus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Light snow ending late in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light in the afternoon. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Saturday 11 February 2023
